artist: Artist: Martin Puryear; Publisher: Paulson Fontaine Press, Berkeley, Calif.
creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstract image in greys, black and white; roughly cornucopia-shaped form with white oval at bottom; lines extending up from center of oval to rounded knob in ULC; mottled grey ground
medium: Color soft-ground etching with spit-bite aquatint, aquatint and drypoint
title: Phrygian (Cap in the Air)
